Cam::

She looked up at Windlord. "OK, since you promised."  She opened up 
the compartment and took out one cube and handed it to Windlord. The 
cube looked black with rainbow lightning flashing inside the 
blaskness of the cube.  "Be careful.  It will go boom if you drop it. 
It can also be added to things that already go boom and make the boom 
much bigger by lots."
